item.title: [GRA7][WebPaaS] - Routine accounts maintenance
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jun 26, 17:00 - 21:00 UTC

Jun 16, 13:08 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 26/06/2023 17:00 UTC
End time : 26/06/2023 21:00 UTC
Service impact : All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade. Our partner will be performing a routine maintenance to optimize performance service on Accounts. This maintenance is expected to impact performance for Accounts services, including the Console, User Accounting, Provisioning and Billing, although, services will remain available at all times.
Service improvement : Our partner communicated to OVHCloud that they will be doing a routine maintenance on account service. This maintenance is expected to not have impact on the projects: no downtime, no performance issue are expected.

item.title: [EU][Telephony] - CTI/Incoming calls
item.description:
Jun 16, 08:45 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 11/06/2023 19:04 UTC
End Time : 12/06/2023 12:48 UTC
Root cause : Network and servers issue.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jun 12, 13:18 UTC
Monitoring - VoIP services are now restored and nominal. We continue to monitor our infrastructures and will publish an incident report accordingly.

We thank again our customers for their patience and extend our apologies for the inconvenience.

Jun 12, 11:26 UTC
Update - We confirm that CCS and EcoFax services have been restored.
Our teams are continuing to work to restore the CTI service (reporting system)
We'll post an update at 13:15 UTC to keep you informed about the situation.

Jun 12, 10:39 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Jun 12, 10:36 UTC
Update - VoIP services (CCS and EcoFax) are currently in a nominal state.
Our teams are continuing to work on the CTI to fully resolve the incident.
A next update will be posted at 11:15 UTC

Jun 12, 09:52 UTC
Update - We identified on Sunday June 11th at 19:10 UTC an incident with a limited impact that was solved on Sunday evening. This Monday morning June 12th, some side effects led to degraded VoIP services (CCS, CTI and EcoFax) for our customers. As a result, OVHcloud teams have enabled their DRP. We are hands on to come up with a fix as soon as possible.

You can follow this page to get updates on the incident.

We ask for your renewed patience and are sorry for any inconvenience this may cause.

Jun 12, 06:37 UTC
Update - Our teams are still working to solve the problem.

Jun 12, 02:23 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Jun 11, 20:47 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 11/06/2023 19:04 UTC
Service impact : Customers may have latencies when using phones provisioning and on incoming calls.
CTI ( Telephony-Computer Coupling) is unreachable.
Between 11/06/2023 19:10 UTC and 20:10 UTC 30% of calls made were unreachable
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

item.title: [SBG/RBX/GRA/BRU][Core Network] - Call routing
item.description:
Jun 8, 16:25 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 07/06/2023 06:32 UTC
End time : 07/06/2023 15:11 UTC

On Wednesday June 7th at 8:27 AM (CET), a network malfunction impacted the VoIP services of some of our customers.

OVHcloud technical teams immediately intervened to identify the cause of the incident and resolve it. Impacted services have been restored on 07/06/2023 15:11 UTC and are now operational.

You can contact our customer service on 1007 or open a support ticket from your Help Center.

We apologize for any inconvenience this may has caused. We will update our support pages with new information as soon as available.

Jun 7, 15:11 UTC
Update - Impacted services are operational.
We will continue to monitor the situation for the time being.
Further explanation will be post here.
We apologized for the inconvenience.

Jun 7, 13:34 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Jun 7, 12:16 UTC
Update - All technical teams are hands on impacted services.
We are doing our very best to resolved the issue.

Jun 7, 09:46 UTC
Update - Our technicians are still working on this situation to solve it.

Jun 7, 08:47 UTC
Update - Update : Our teams are still investigating the cause of the service degradation.

Jun 7, 08:46 UTC
Update - Our technicians are currently working on in order to fix it.

Jun 7, 06:59 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 07/06/2023 06:32 UTC
Service impact : We noticed call routing errors on our core infrastructure
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are investigating on this issue. They are checking our network.
Update will be post as significant progress is made.
